Text: Malicious virus packed along with the songs. Don't download. Stop seeding/leeching.

Update: If you have the virus follow these steps:

1. Download and run a rootkit scanner. TDSSKILLER is a good and free. (find on google)

2. Download and run a malware scanner. PCTools Spyware Doctor is good free one.

3. Download and run CCleaner with advanced settings. Also free.

You should be good to go. Rootkit virus's like these are nasty. Good luck.
